Name: FBL-8a Arms Justified
Description:
Item Type: Light Armor
Damage Reduction: 20%
Temp. Rating: -35 / 65 Â°C

Based on CDS' FBL-8a combat armor, this set has been modified from its original form. This light armor will keep you fast on your feet with its strategic mix of protective plating and reinforced nano-weave fabrics. While the armor works with any undersuit, it was specifically designed to match the FBL-8u undersuit with special attention given to how the two fit together to make the set as streamlined and responsive as possible.
